data.title: The Jesus Incident: The Pandora Sequence 1
data.meta_description: Sequel to Frank Herbert’s Destination: Void, the first book in Herbert & Ransom’s Pandora Sequence. A sentient Ship with godlike powers (and aspirations) delivers the last survivors of humanity to a horrific, poisonous planet, Pandora—rife with deadly Nerve-Runners, Hooded Dashers, airborne jellyfish, and intellige
data.text:
A sentient Ship with godlike powers (and aspirations) delivers the last survivors of humanity to a horrific, poisonous planet, Pandora—rife with deadly Nerve-Runners, Hooded Dashers, airborne jellyfish, and intelligent kelp. Chaplain/Psychiatrist Raja Lon Flattery is brought back out of hybernation to witness Ship’s machinations as well as the schemes of human scientists manipulating the genetic structure of humanity.

eBook ISBN: 978-1-61475-268-4

Trade paperback ISBN: 978-1-61475-228-8

Hardcover ISBN: 978-1-68057-493-7

412 pages
